org.meganekkovr

クラス Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.meganekkovr.Entity
  • 直系の既知のサブクラス:
    Scene

    public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity is a basic class in Meganekko. It is something on VR scene. Entity has transform information such as position, scale, and rotation. It can have child Entities and Components. Entity which will be rendered has to have GeometryComponent and SurfaceRendererComponent.

      • newInstance

        protected long newInstance()
        Override this to create own native instance. Native class must be derived from mgn::Entity.
        戻り値:
        Native pointer value return from C++ new.

      • findById

        @Nullable
public Entity findById(int id)
        Find Entity from children. Typically, id is R.id.xxx value.
        パラメータ:
        id - ID
        戻り値:
        Found Entity or null if it has no matched Entity with id.

        public void setRotation(org.joml.Quaternionf rotation)
        Set rotation, as a quaternion. Sets the transform's current rotation in quaternion terms.
        パラメータ:
        rotation - rotation

        Get Entity's local rotation.
        戻り値:

      • from

        public static Entity from(android.view.View view)
        Create Entity from View. New Entity has plane geometry.
        パラメータ:
        view - View for surface.
        戻り値:
        new Entity

      • from

        public static Entity from(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable)
        Create Entity from Drawable. New Entity has plane geometry.
        パラメータ:
        drawable - Drawable for surface.
        戻り値:
        new Entity

      • view

        public android.view.View view()
        Get View. This works only for Entity which is created by from(View) or has SurfaceRendererComponent which is created by SurfaceRendererComponent.from(View).
        戻り値:
        View

      • animate

        public EntityAnimator animate()
        Short hand for new EntityAnimator(entity).
        戻り値:
        new EntityAnimator

      • setOpacity

        public void setOpacity(float opacity)
        Set Entity's opacity.
        パラメータ:
        opacity - Float in the range of 0.0 - 1.0 indicating how transparent the Entity is.

      • getRenderingOpacity

        public float getRenderingOpacity()
        Get actual opacity used in rendering. This value can be different with value returned from getOpacity().
        戻り値:
        Rendering opacity

      • getOpacity

        public float getOpacity()
        Get opacity set with setOpacity(float). Actual opacity used in rendering can get with getRenderingOpacity().
        戻り値:
        opacity

      • setVisible

        public void setVisible(boolean visible)
        Set visibility. If set to false, its children also become not be rendered. Default value is true.
        パラメータ:
        visible - visibility

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        Get visibility of this Entity. Note that this will return its own visibility.
        戻り値:
        visibility

      • isShown

        public boolean isShown()
        戻り値:
        true if this entity and ancestors are all visible. Otherwise false.
